name: Reverse Freeze
description:
Description: 
You are in a snowy field during a snowstorm. You suddenly see a clock. Touching it makes it go away, but you also feel a bit warmer. How long can you survive?

Controls:

KEY WHAT IT DOES W Move Up  A Move Left  S Move Down D Move Right  Mouse Move Left Move camera left  Mouse Move Right Move camera right                                                              PPause/UnpauseEsc Close the game

How to Play: 
Go around to collect clocks to rewind time back to when you were warmer. Avoid the Ghosts at all costs.
Once your body temperature reaches a certain point, it's game over.
The colder you are, the slower you move, and the faster you freeze.
Try to survive as long as you can.
